name: Rage Game
description:
Hey there rager!
Derp has recently been told of the glorious.....wait for it.....spectacular.....wait for it....ragey....waiting -_-.....gamey........o.o.....RAGE GAME
Fight to become the best rage charachter of all gtime.
Compete with your friend derps and compare highscores. Buy new charachters and buy better weapons to kicksome *%$. What. That was for app ._.
So why are you even reading this you idiot
Go rage!
